text: Dryopteris hasseltii is a species of fern in the family Dryopteridaceae. It occurs from India, through southeast Asia, as far as north-east Queensland in Australia. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== hasseltii Category:Ferns of Asia Category:Ferns of India Category:Flora of China Category:Flora of Malesia Category:Flora of New Guinea Category:Flora of Queensland Category:Nature Conservation Act rare biota Category:Endangered biota of Queensland Category:Endangered flora of Australia Category:Rare flora of Australia Category:Ferns of Australia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Dryopteris hasseltii
